channel.title: [release] ritzscape source || coin credits || all the features [release]

item.title: [release] ritzscape source || coin credits || all the features [release]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:76, topic:412402”][quote author=.::Ix Miir xI::. link=topic=513659.msg3731898#msg3731898 date=1314667060]

Seriously? This is why you have been arguing? You think I didn’t correct him?

Like I have already said, there wasn’t anything to be corrected.

So… 508s are harder than a 317 and they aren’t written in the same language.

You’ll say, “No I didn’t say that”

Then I say, " I corrected him, yes being an asshole because of my big ego (already been established), but he needed correcting. If you know Java there shouldn’t be a problem coding any revision.

Its obvious you shouldn’t predict what I am going to say otherwise you wouldn’t have started this, but in a 508 files and code in files are found in different places and someone who hasn’t used a source above the 317 revision will not know where to find anything they need. So since he has no knowledge of a 508 source yet he will not know this and in turn it will be hard for him to code and like he said, he will need to learn it. Like I said before, this conversation was started because I don’t like people treating others like there better then them, even if they are. You keep continuing on about you correcting him when you didn’t and I really don’t care if you think you did or not.
[/quote]

Okay, so the packaging is different between a 317 and a 508+. Shouldn’t be a problem if someone uses an IDE. Which I explain here -> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514125.msg3731410.html#msg3731410

/discussion[/quote]

Well that’s very nicely detailed.

Read full topic

item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=".::Ix Miir xI::., post:74, topic:412402"][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=513659.msg3731863#msg3731863 date=1314666551]

Seriously? This is why you have been arguing? You think I didn’t correct him?

Like I have already said, there wasn’t anything to be corrected.

So… 508s are harder than a 317 and they aren’t written in the same language.

You’ll say, “No I didn’t say that”

Then I say, " I corrected him, yes being an asshole because of my big ego (already been established), but he needed correcting. If you know Java there shouldn’t be a problem coding any revision.
[/quote]
Its obvious you shouldn’t predict what I am going to say otherwise you wouldn’t have started this, but in a 508 files and code in files are found in different places and someone who hasn’t used a source above the 317 revision will not know where to find anything they need. So since he has no knowledge of a 508 source yet he will not know this and in turn it will be hard for him to code and like he said, he will need to learn it. Like I said before, this conversation was started because I don’t like people treating others like there better then them, even if they are. You keep continuing on about you correcting him when you didn’t and I really don’t care if you think you did or not.[/quote]

Okay, so the packaging is different between a 317 and a 508+. Shouldn’t be a problem if someone uses an IDE. Which I explain here -> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514125.msg3731410.html#msg3731410

/discussion

Read full topic

item.title: [release] ritzscape source || coin credits || all the features [release]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=".::Ix Miir xI::., post:74, topic:412402"][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=513659.msg3731863#msg3731863 date=1314666551]

Seriously? This is why you have been arguing? You think I didn’t correct him?

Like I have already said, there wasn’t anything to be corrected.

So… 508s are harder than a 317 and they aren’t written in the same language.

You’ll say, “No I didn’t say that”

Then I say, " I corrected him, yes being an asshole because of my big ego (already been established), but he needed correcting. If you know Java there shouldn’t be a problem coding any revision.
[/quote]
Its obvious you shouldn’t predict what I am going to say otherwise you wouldn’t have started this, but in a 508 files and code in files are found in different places and someone who hasn’t used a source above the 317 revision will not know where to find anything they need. So since he has no knowledge of a 508 source yet he will not know this and in turn it will be hard for him to code and like he said, he will need to learn it. Like I said before, this conversation was started because I don’t like people treating others like there better then them, even if they are. You keep continuing on about you correcting him when you didn’t and I really don’t care if you think you did or not.[/quote]

Take it from a guy who’s gone through all the files of almost every revision. 317’s files are located in different places then in 508s, 525s, 562s, etc.

Also there are different files, such as basically everything to do with npcs spawning in 1 location is handeled in spawn-npc,java or something’s name similar to that, while in 562s everything to do with npc spawning is handled in npc.xml.

There is also different setups in both npc files.

This is just an example ^.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Ix_Miir_xI wrote:

m1lkman:

Seriously? This is why you have been arguing? You think I didn’t correct him?

wow… Since you cant understand what was said before… I am talking to you about not being a complete asshole when there is no need for it. Like I have already said, there wasn’t anything to be corrected, I also don’t think we should continue this conversation if you aren’t capable of keeping up with what has been currently said.

item.title: [release] ritzscape source || coin credits || all the features [release]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=".::Ix Miir xI::., post:69, topic:412402"][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=513659.msg3731733#msg3731733 date=1314663281]

why are there people out in the world who act like complete douche bags?

OMGZ DOOD YOU R SO SMART! CUS A 508 IZ CODED IN SOMEOTHER LANGUAGEE OTer THAN JABA!

Moron. Learn Java and you can code any revision.

OMGZ DOOD YOU R SUCH A AZZHOLE! CUS PEEPL LIEK HAEV NO FRENDZ!

Asshole

lol ikr noobs these days…

lol ikr 10 year old queers these days…

Scrub. I corrected his mistake. Like rep matters in this community anyways. Trolls belong under the bridge, go away.

and his mistake was? Did i say rep mattered? I also find it funny that you indirectly called me a troll when your trolling around this topic because you want to feel like people give a shit about you talking trash to someone posting work to allow others to use.

You de-repped me implying that rep matters. It doesn’t.

His mistake was that he thought coding a 508 was harder than coding a 317. Which is wrong. They are both written in the same language. The syntax and packets might be different but it’s the same general stuff.

Most noob coders think that. Don’t be a freaking asshole about it and just simply tell him that to just learn how to code with java, instead of being an asshole.

He insulted my programming ability. I of course with my big ego, had to put him down a few notches. We already corrected it and it was all fine but then Mirr or whatever the hell his name is had to be a tool about it.

Shutup Judo. You don’t know what you’re talking about.
[/quote]
the ignorance flowing from your body right now is insulting to mankind… and what did you “correct”? You respond to his post saying you used a ritzscape source and fucked up on it by calling him a moron and talking to him as if he has a mental disability. Sorry i didnt allow you to make fun of him without having me say something.

Srry java but i had to say something, i cant stand people that act like this[/quote]

Seriously? This is why you have been arguing? You think I didn’t correct him?

m1lkman:

Learn Java and you can code any revision.

Read full topic

Scrub. I corrected his mistake. Like rep matters in this community anyways. Trolls belong under the bridge, go away.[/quote]

So you belong under the bridge too? As far as I know this is troll words:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:55, topic:412402”]OMGZ DOOD YOU R SO SMART! CUS A 508 IZ CODED IN SOMEOTHER LANGUAGEE OTer THAN JABA!

Moron. Learn Java and you can code any revision.[/quote]

Although I do agree with the “Learn Java” part

item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“billyfreeman, post:50, topic:412402”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=513659.msg3731229#msg3731229 date=1314644600]
This just proves how retarded the RitzScape community is. Nigscape sucks, quit trying to make it seem like it is a new game or some shit. Horrible Delta. Complete shit.

If you are going to release a once great server, make it like it was when it was great. This is the ritzscape with that retard Jamie “coding npcs [and shit] to the highest possible standards”. Shouldn’t be too hard.
[/quote]

said from the person that made his own ritzscape source. and the name didnt even work! lol, the usernames got cut off!. ffs[/quote]

Spent like 5 minutes on that piece of shit. Learned alot since then. Working on a Hyperion 474, not even sure you know what that is.
